summary: I HAVE A JEEP GRAND CHEROKEE LAREDO 1999. (PURCHASED NEW) WE ARE HAVING CONTINUED PROBLEMS WITH THE FRONT BRAKES.  TODAY THE 3RD SET OF NEW ROTORS WERE INSTALLED.  MY VEHICLE ONLY HAS 28,700 MILES!!!! WHEN BRAKING THIS IS A VERY UNSTABLE VEHICLE. VIBRATIONS ARE SO SEVERE IT FEELS AS IF YOU COULD LOOSE CONTROL OF THE VEHICLE.  SO MANY PEOPLE HAVE THE SAME COMPLAINT.  WHY NO RECALL???????  *NLM
